title: Consanguineous marriage among familial multiple sclerosis subjects: A national registry-based study
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Zahra Salehi, Mohammad Mehdi Naghizadeh, Sajjad Ghane Ezabadi, Azadeh Ebrahimitirtashi, Naghmeh Abbasi Kasbi, Faezeh Khodaie, Shahram Aliyari, Fereshteh Ashtari, Seyed Mohammad Baghbanian, Seyed Massood Nabavi, Samaneh Hosseini, Nazanin Razazian, Vahid Shaygannejad, Nastaran Majdi-Nasab, Mohammad Hossein Harirchian, Asghar Bayati, Hoda Kamali, Nahid Hosseni Nejad Mir, Nahid Beladi Moghadam, Maryam Poursadeghfard
